subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Bubba Watson, who shot a 62 and has a one-stroke lead over Justin Rose, who fired a 64, combined for 17 birdies and one eagle at the W.G.C.-Cadillac Championship.
snippet: Bubba Watson, who shot a 62 and has a one-stroke lead over Justin Rose, who fired a 64, combined for 17 birdies and one eagle at the W.G.C.-Cadillac Championship.
